body_html: Might not totally be related to the original question but what worked for me as a workaround is to fully train the inception model from scratch and then export it to serving. Of course, that involves the extra resources needed for the full training run but might be a suitable way for some seeking to serve their own classification model.

body: Might not totally be related to the original question but what worked for me as a workaround is to fully train the inception model from scratch and then export it to serving. Of course, that involves the extra resources needed for the full training run but might be a suitable way for some seeking to serve their own classification model.
